Subject: Heritrix: crawls of stream content
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=236585540

Hi!

I'm doing my diploma work at European Archive.
My task is to implement a module for Heritrix crawler in order to crawl and
store AV contents (stream objects such as movies).

I'm new to this project and I'd like to know what was already done in this. I've
heard that Heritrix works for certain movie's extensions, but not for all.

My first task will be to point out all these unhandled video formats and to find
out a way to archive them.

If anybody has even a beginning of solution, please let me know.

Thank you.

Nico
